krpano.title: 360° Tour
krpano.action: if(startscene === null OR !scene[get(startscene)], copy(startscene,scene[0].name); ); loadscene(get(startscene), null, MERGE); if(startactions !== null, startactions() ); landscape-mobile(); wait(1); sidebar_zeigen();

if(title, txtadd(layer[titel-text].html, Aktueller Standpunkt:
, get(scene[get(xml.scene)].title) ); , copy(layer[titel-text].html, scene[get(xml.scene)].title ); );

for(set(i,0), i LT hotspot.count, inc(i), getlooktodistance(d, hotspot[get(i)].ath, hotspot[get(i)].atv); if(d LT 8, highlight_hotspot(get(i), get(hotspot[get(i)].name)); , background_hotspot(get(i), get(hotspot[get(i)].name)); ); );
if(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted != true, set(activehotspot,%2); set(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted, true); callwith(hotspot[%2], onover); callwith(plugin[%2], onover); set(plugin[%2].hovering, true); );
if(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted, set(hotspot[%1].ishighlighted, false); callwith(hotspot[%2], onout); callwith(plugin[%2], onout); set(plugin[%2].hovering, false); set(activehotspot,null); );
for(set(i,0), i LT hotspot.count, inc(i), set(hotspot[get(i)].visible,false); );

for(set(i,0), i LT hotspot.count, inc(i), copy(hs,hotspot[get(i)]); if(hs.name != 'vr_cursor' AND hs.name != 'skin_webvr_prev_scene' AND hs.name != 'skin_webvr_next_scene', set(hotspot[get(i)].visible,true); ); );

scene.name: scene_BAD_KOHLGRUB
scene.title: BAD KOHLGRUB
scene.action: set(layer[activespot].visible, true); set(layer[activespot].parent, spot5); set(layer[spot1].scale, 1.0); set(layer[spot2].scale, 1.0); set(layer[spot3].scale, 1.0); set(layer[spot4].scale, 1.0); set(layer[spot5].scale, 1.8); set(layer[spot6].scale, 1.0); set(layer[spot7].scale, 1.0); set(layer[spot8].scale, 1.0);

hotspot.name: NADIR
hotspot.onloaded: if(webvr.isenabled == true, set(visible, false);); if(webvr.isenabled == false, set(visible, true););
